overview: Erotic magazine photographer Brad Posey selects new scenes of his favorite models from his private collection. Five young and adventurous guys strip down and bare it all for their very first nude photo sessions. Featuring virtually 100% previously unreleased video footage of Club 1821's most popular models of all time - including Sebastian (aka Simon Rex). Loaded with cock stroking, steamy poses and revealing talk, Posey has captured it all live on video and in remarkable still photos. Intimate, unscripted, and unrehearsed.
title: Hot Sessions 11
